name: Combo Launcher
description:
Welcome to COMBO LAUNCHER! 

Keep a combo alive to stay alive.  Move with WASD, point and click to shoot in a direction.  Keep damaging enemies to add too your COMBO meter at the top of the screen. Keep your COMBO value alive to increase your damage and bullet speed. Avoid being hit and use your bullets carefully, as these decrease your CONBO meter.  If your COMBO meter reaches zero you die.  Good luck on surviving all 5 waves.
